BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PIST_ACR_TRACK_DTL (STR_ESTB_ATTRI_CODE,STR_EST_SECTION,NUM_DEPT_ID,STR_EMP_NUMBER,NUM_SL_NO,DT_ACR_FROM_DATE,DT_ACR_TO_DATE,DT_SENT_TO_EMP,DT_EMP_REC_DATE,STR_COMPLETION_STATUS,STR_OFF_SUPT_REMARKS,STR_ACR_STATUS,STR_OS_EMP_NUMBER,DT_REC_FROM_EMP,DT_SENT_TO_RO,STR_RO_ESTB_ATTRI_CODE,STR_RO_DEPT_ID,STR_RO_EMP_NUMBER,STR_RO_PER_GRADE, STR_RO_REMARKS, DT_REC_FROM_RO, DT_SENT_TO_REV,STR_REV_ESTB_ATTRI_CODE,STR_REV_DEPT_ID,STR_REV_EMP_NUMBER,STR_REV_PER_GRADE,STR_REV_REMAKRS,DT_REC_FROM_REV, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PIST_ACR_TRACK_DTL A SET A.STR_ESTB_ATTRI_CODE=?,A.STR_EST_SECTION=?,A.NUM_DEPT_ID=?,A.STR_EMP_NUMBER=?,A.NUM_SL_NO=?,A.DT_ACR_FROM_DATE=?,A.DT_ACR_TO_DATE=?,A.DT_SENT_TO_EMP=?,A.DT_EMP_REC_DATE=?,A.STR_COMPLETION_STATUS=?,A.STR_OFF_SUPT_REMARKS=?,A.STR_ACR_STATUS=?,A.STR_OS_EMP_NUMBER=?,A.DT_REC_FROM_EMP=?,A.DT_SENT_TO_RO=?,A.STR_RO_ESTB_ATTRI_CODE=?,A.STR_RO_DEPT_ID=?,A.STR_RO_EMP_NUMBER=?,A.STR_RO_PER_GRADE=?,A.STR_RO_REMARKS=?,A.DT_REC_FROM_RO=?,A.DT_SENT_TO_REV=?,A.STR_REV_ESTB_ATTRI_CODE=?,A.STR_REV_DEPT_ID=?,A.STR_REV_EMP_NUMBER=?, A.STR_REV_PER_GRADE=?, STR_REV_REMAKRS=?, DT_REC_FROM_REV=?, A.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, A.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, A.GDT_EFFECT_DATE=?, A.GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?, A.GNUM_ISVALID=?, A.GNUM_SEAT_ID=?, A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? WHERE A.STR_EMP_NUMBER=? and A.dt_acr_from_date >= trunc(to_date(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')) and A.dt_acr_from_date < trunc(to_date(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')+1) and A.DT_ACR_TO_DATE >= trunc(to_date(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')) and A.DT_ACR_TO_DATE < trunc(to_date(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')+1) AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PIST_ACR_TRACK_DTL A SET A.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE A.STR_EMP_NUMBER=? and A.dt_acr_from_date>=trunc(to_date(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')) and A.dt_acr_from_date < trunc(to_date(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')+1) and A.DT_ACR_TO_DATE >= trunc(to_date(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')) and A.DT_ACR_TO_DATE < trunc(to_date(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')+1) AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
